body:
Comment 2: 
I'm not sure if there's a good reason for this, but I've make a CL to make the Linux 
Setsid the same as the Darwin one. The manpages for setsid indicate that it behaves 
the same on both platforms.

http://golang.org/cl/878047/show
_Owner changed to **a...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Started**._
